Description: 'Kohl' tube of palm-column form: the hollow shaft is of opaque dark-blue glass, its base outlined with a yellow thread. The lower body is decorated with a chevron pattern in opaque white and yellow alternating. The upper shaft is encircled by an opaque yellow thread with a white thread above and below. Yellow threads outline the individual elements of the capital. The rim of the opening has a single yellow thread. The core is white.
